response.original_title: Great Women Singers of the 20th Century: Abbey Lincoln
response.overview: Abbey is seen a rare 1991 performance at the Promenade Theater in New York. She is at once beautiful, insightful and at the top of her musical gifts. The appearance represents the beginning of a great comeback that has since established her as a legendary jazz vocalist and composer.
response.title: Great Women Singers of the 20th Century: Abbey Lincoln
